phrases: Steve, a block that is 1 pixel high and 1 pixel wide, is not called a block.
Let us move on to the new world!
You are experiencing the sorrows and delights of this world in the flow of time we call eternity.
However, the moment you wish to die your soul will be mine.
And now, I wish you a pleasant journey.
It is just a scratch, it is nothing!
He wants to open the Gate wide enough to swallow Assiah!
I have been dreaming for the past 15 years.
A dream to make a new world by uniting Assiah and Gehenna.
This is going just the way Satan wants!
You wicked creatures who would trample the blooming lilies of the fields,
I, Arthur Auguste Angel, will hand judgment down on you!
It will not work if we attack on our own!
It is just as Yukio says.
If we do not work together, we cannot get through the defenses on that huge wall-thing.
I have not fallen so low as to need you to worry about me.
It is a stain on my record to cooperate with the offspring of a demon,
Kirigakure Style Demon Sword Technique: Slither!
Do not tell me she is gone with Okumura!
Every exorcist get ready to drive the demons back!
Everyone else go evacuate further inside!
I did not think the demons could make it this far.
He is so stupid he would forget to die even if he got killed!
It is because I did all that...
and you probably do not even consider me your brother at all.
You are a mean little brother.
You did not tell me you could see demons,
or that you were a teacher at the cram school.
Not to mention becoming the paladin.
It is really tough to have such a smart little brother!
Just depend on me once in a while like when we were kids.
I am not going to run away anymore!
I was the familiar of the strongest exorcist, Shiro!
I guess it is because I had demonic power awaken in me,
but I can hear Blackie's voice now.
Can I get on too, Blackie?
It is no longer about demons or humans.
They love Assiah, where they lived together with Shiro.
Damn, there is no end to them!
I hope the boys are all right...
We should worry about ourselves first!
The black mist that appeared around the True Cross Academy in the evening
is still present and in a 20km radius the Order of the True Cross has been...
Even if I went there, I would not be able t' help them at all.
I have t' do what I can do.
North of the True Cross Academy campus...
Gods of the Forge, please protect Lil' Ryu'n' his friends!
There is no end to them!
They will calm down at dawn!
We must hold out until then!
But the sun just went down...
We cannot hold out like this.
The Japanese Branch is connected to the Vatican Headquarters, is not it?
The time difference is seven hours!
What is with the time difference?
We could evacuate to the Vatican Headquarters with the magic keys.
Over there it is still daytime...
Now we just have to lure the demons to this plaza!
No, we do not need to do that.
We have got to attack the Gate itself, Rin.
But those small fries are in the way!
And even if we attack it directly, they will just shield it again!
We will guide the sunlight over to the Japanese Branch.
That way we will not have to evacuate here,
and we will not get the people in the Vatican in trouble either.
Yeah, this is our only chance!
They can control the flames surprisingly well!
You are amazing indeed, Okumura Brothers!
Yeah, let us smash that Gate to pieces!
Why would the brats born from me and Yuri destroy our dream?
We do not give a damn about your dream!
I could not fulfill your dream.
The boys will show whether or not the path we chose is correct.
And you are not even hurt!
Do not make us worry like that!
I guess he went back to Gehenna.
But he might come back one day.
Why are you two always so reckless?
Do not make me worry like that!
Are you our mother or something?
What a troublesome bunch you are!
Where have you been all this time?
Brother, your beloved toy town is in ruins.
I just remembered this man from hundreds of years ago,
who took on one of my challenges and stood his ground.
It was a challenge literally with his life on the line.
Of course I did, but at the moment of his death the man shouted,
I now enjoy the highest moment - this!
I finally understand how you felt back then.
A month has passed since then.
I mean, Johann Faust returned to the Academy,
and classes started again as normal.
It is been used as a love potion since ancient times.
You must be careful when pulling it out of the ground, it screams very loudly.
Hearing that sound directly can cause death...
Yukio lost his paladin rank and got demoted back to middle first class.
They said it had something to do with the human resource management of the Vatican, but I do not really get the details.
You called me here, and you still do not know?
The Principal gave me this key,
saying I should come here with you.
Right before Satan possessed me, his memories came rushing in.
Mother gave birth to us in this abandoned forest... giving her life in exchange.
They are a type of golem.
This is where we were born.
On a snowy night Father found us here.
Mother gave us to him before her last breath.
You must have seen it in those memories...
What kind of a person was she?
More like... she looked like someone... or that she had big eyes...
Is it really all right for us to have been born into this world?
If it was not for us, Mother and Father would still be alive,
and so many people around us would not have gotten hurt.
We were born because the old fart and Mother worked so hard!
You should treasure the precious life we got from them!
They were amazing, were not they?
They were our parents after all!
Route 3 inbound lane at the True Cross Junction blocked!
The vicinity of the south gate of the Academy is sealed!
It is a dangerous demon that possesses vehicles and causes terrible accidents!
Do not let your guard down!
Esquires are not allowed to take part in the operation!
Oh come on, do not be so strict.
Brothers are there to help anytime.
It is dangerous, so get back here right now!
The enemy is a demon that possesses vehicles.
It switched from the bike to a truck!
Why are you getting in the way?
Look, there is someone in the truck!
We have to get rid of it along with the truck!
Why are you judging it so easily?
They run wild because you do not listen to them!
We have to take down the demons who hurt people!
You should listen to their side of the story!
That is what a true exorcist is like!
At least the old fart would have said so.
What do you two think you are doing?
I will keep it busy, in the mean time you look for its weak point!
ma mer ry christ mas ma me
ma mer ry christ mas ma me
ma me ma merry christ mas
It is alright kokoro ni mo nai
sakete toorenai michi wa itsu kara ka konna datta
haite suteru hodo ni taikutsu datta
kizu darake ni natte try for pride
haite sutete mo kekkyoku taisetsu nanda
harewatari michi ni hikari wa sashita
Let us fight osore wa nai
Dark side in my heart is
the unerasable sadness of the past.
It is alright if I do not really mean it,
so I fire my blasters and stretch out my hands.
Since when has my way been unavoidable like this?
And now there is no one left...
I cry for my pride, I cannot bear it.
Ah, ah, ah, alone in my world.
An aria of love resounding through
this distorted reality of twisted prayers.
My dreams and tomorrow are collapsing,
because throwing away the lies would be boring.
try it for your pride, covered in wounds.
Ah, ah, ah, alone in my world.
Even so, I sing the song of love and
let its wish reach through this distorted world
to build our bonds and the tomorrow to come.
Throwing away the lies was important after all,
because this is my precious life.
Dark cloud in my heart is
disappearing and light is shining on the road I am on.
Let us fight, there is no fear.
mau chou no you ni hirari
koko wa dokoka betsu no sekai
juudaina ayamachi ni mo kizukazu ni
hito kara hito e to tsunagaru
totemo kirei de maru de kinu no ito
kore ga unmei to iu kusari nano ka
I am lightly fluttering in wondrous light
like a dancing butterfly in midair.
Is this place in another world?
My fall is not slowing down so
The numbers that make my head spin
and there I notice a terrible error.
is a shining pale indigo blue wire.
It is beautiful like a thread of silk.
I wonder if it is what they call the chains of fate?
You seek for it and yet you are already caught,
so do not try to struggle.
You are a beautiful fool in
the way you get entwined in this
You seek for it and yet you are already caught,
so do not try to struggle.
You are a beautiful fool in
the way you get entwined in it.
